definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Such people who suffer from the left side should try this.
sentences.chinese: 那些左脈受阻的人應該試一下。

sentences.english: He was angry at having his plans crossed .
sentences.chinese: 他因自己的計劃受阻而氣忿。

sentences.english: The pupation and eclosion were hindered by treatment of larvae.
sentences.chinese: 處理的幼蟲化蛹率，羽化而受阻。

sentences.english: She watched him steal a glimpse at the marooned bus.
sentences.chinese: 她看到他偷偷瞟了一眼受阻的汽車。

sentences.english: They want to do more, but they feel held back.
sentences.chinese: 他們還想做更多，但他們感到受阻。

sentences.english: The reason why the traffic was blocked was that an accident happened ahead.
sentences.chinese: 交通受阻的原因就是前面出車禍了。

sentences.english: Should the Vessel be prevented from China trading, Charterers to have the option of cancelling the Charter.
sentences.chinese: 如本船航行中因受阻，租船人有解除本租約的選擇權。

sentences.english: The problem turned out to be a mutation that inactivated a gene called LRP5.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題產生於導致LRP5基因活動受阻的變異。

sentences.english: Attacking has sometimes been a problem for him but he is scoring more goals now.
sentences.chinese: 進攻有時會受阻但他現在已經打開了勝利之門。

sentences.english: The developments of haustorial mother cells and haustoria were retarded, malformed, and necrotized .
sentences.chinese: 吸器母細胞和吸器發育受阻，畸形，壞死。

sentences.english: Heavy snowfall and strong waves make many parts of the country land and sea traffic congestion.
sentences.chinese: 強降雪和大浪令全國多個地區地面和海上交通受阻。

sentences.english: Are you still hopefully for an Arrested Development movie?
sentences.chinese: 你仍在盼望《發展受阻》的電影版嗎？

sentences.english: The invasion was held up by unexpectedly stout resistance.
sentences.chinese: 入侵行動因遭遇到了出乎意料的頑強抵抗而受阻。

sentences.english: If the air is blocked, the fan will turn, but not blow air.
sentences.chinese: 如果空氣迴流受阻，那麼風扇會轉，卻不會吹動空氣。

sentences.english: But I was caught in the traffic.
sentences.chinese: 但是我受阻於路上交通擁塞。

sentences.english: When a female has tears in her eyes, the one who cannot see is the male
sentences.chinese: 女性淚眼矇矓之時，視線受阻的是男性。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
(military) (of a city etc) to fall into enemy hands/(fig.) to take a turn for the worse
